mapper.update: update RESCUE_BANK_INFO set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAR_NUMBER = #{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_BRANCH_NAME = #{bankBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, USER_ID, CAR_NUMBER, BANK_NAME, BANK_BRANCH_NAME, UPDATE_TIME, USER_NAME from RESCUE_BANK_INFO
